name: RobotoriControl
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robotori control
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Robotory Control supports the verification of command statements.

By activating this skill in an app registered in the Play Store and bluetooth connection between the app and the robotori device, you can control the robotori device by voice.

"Alexa Open Robotori Control"
Use the command to execute the skill and ask:

"Tori move forward one time"
It commands your device to move forward one time.

Or

"Tori turn left two time"
gives the command to rotate 2 times to the left.

For composite commands

"Tori move forward one time turn right two time"
Up to 10 composite commands can be issued as shown in .

For the basic structure of the command:
Move : "Tori" + "move" + ("forward" or "backward" or "left" or "right") + "move count" + ("time" or "times")

Turn: "Tori" + "turn" + ("left" or "right") + "turn count" + ("time" or "times")

Light : "Tori" + "light" + ("on" or "off") + "light count" + ("time" or "times")

If you command only one movement
Like "Tori move forward"
You can remove count and time and command.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
